job_tasks.phrase: The Linux team is continuously improving the current infrastructure landscape by automation and the use of new technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of improving the existing infrastructure to meet business needs through automation and new technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Besides ensuring excellent operations your activities will support the team in building and expanding (new) systems and platforms, enhancing existing infrastructure, the infra delivery to our internal customers, and carrying out life cycle management of systems and software.
job_tasks.justification: This describes supporting business functions by building, expanding, and managing infrastructure, demonstrating alignment with business delivery.
This directly refers to the operational aspect of managing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: carrying out life cycle management of systems and software.
job_tasks.justification: Life cycle management is a core component of operations and maintenance in an IT context.

job_tasks.phrase: building and expanding (new) systems and platforms
job_tasks.justification: This implies the development and creation of new systems and platforms.
This refers to modifying and improving existing systems, which involves development work.

soft_skills.phrase: You take initiative and collaborate well within team and with other colleagues
You carry projects from the start to a maintainable solution including knowledge sharing
Your communication and coordination skills are developed well
You are enthusiastic, energetic and take ownership
At Odido we learn every day. All of us. You are responsible for your own development.
You decide how, what and when you learn.
You keep your manager and colleagues informed of your goals and progress.
You love to challenge people in a positive way

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on infrastructure management, automation, and operations for a Linux team. It lacks any mention of generative AI, large language models, or related technologies and tasks that would qualify it for a GenAI Engineer profile.
